Question: The DiSTI Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DiSTI Corporation

CES 2024 | Automotive Solutions

- DiSTI Corporation will be showcasing their latest in #Automotive HMI Software Tools and Virtual Maintenance Training Solutions at CES 2024.

- The company offers GL Studio® HMI, a Human Machine Interface Software trusted by designers for cockpit instruments and displays.

- DiSTI also provides VE Studio® VMT for creating complex and immersive 3D commercial and military training applications globally.

- Their VE Mentor™ platform allows the development of both classroom and hands-on training.

- DiSTI Schoolhouse™ enables the utilization of the Learning Management System (LMS) of choice, for quick and scalable deployment.
